mapper.sql: fid, fcoinid, fadderess, fuid, fcreatetime, version, init, fremark
mapper.insert: insert into f_user_virtual_address_withdraw ( fcoinid, fadderess, fuid, fcreatetime, version, init, fremark ) values ( #{fcoinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fadderess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{init,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update f_user_virtual_address_withdraw set fcoinid = #{fcoinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fadderess = #{fadderess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuid = #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = version+1, init = #{init,jdbcType=BIT}, fremark = #{fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
